original_text: The husband may wait for many days after he hears about his wife's promise. If he then refuses to let her do what she promised, he will be guilty. God will punish him instead of his wife.’
korean_text: 그러나 그의 남편이 들은 지 얼마 후에 그것을 무효하게 하면 그가 아내의 죄를 담당할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: The husband may wait for many days
sentences.korean_translation: 남편은 여러 날을 기다릴 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: after he hears about his wife's promise
sentences.korean_translation: 아내의 약속에 대해 듣고 난 후에

sentences.original_text: If he then refuses to let her do what she promised
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그가 그때 아내가 약속한 것을 하도록 허락하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: God will punish him instead of his wife
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 아내 대신 그를 벌하실 것입니다
